episodes.synopsis: In New York, Alex attempts a con in a table tennis match, uses a trick to win a seafood-eating contest, tries to hustle a chess player and more.
episodes.title: New York

episodes.synopsis: Alex starts in Texas to examine the legacy of hustler Titanic Thompson and cons a car dealer in Dallas out of a brand-new yellow Mustang.
episodes.title: Texas

episodes.synopsis: On the way to Vegas, Alex bets on flies landing on sugar cubes, outruns a horse on foot and meets the man who had breast implants to win $100,000.
episodes.title: Las Vegas

video.title: Hustling America
video.synopsis: Magician Alexis Conran travels America to replicate the elaborate cons perpetrated by the country's greatest hustlers, including "Titanic" Thompson.
